title.rendered: WordPress Website Theme Ideas: Up-to-Date Strategies to Increase eCommerce Sales

content.rendered:
“You name it, you will have it.” WordPress works on the same principle. It shapes every professional’s dream and renovates their business ideas with inevitable digital impressions. Having an online presence is not enough if you are eager to compete in this digitalized age. You have to implement up-to-date strategies to manage your website precisely. And, that’s why WordPress business ideas are the first choice.

When revamping your website, the content management system (CMS) plays a pivotal role. Through CMS, you enhance your website performance and imbibe the highest standards into your site. As per the W3techs report, more than 35% of websites are active on WordPress. Indirectly, every fourth site you visit is powered by WordPress.

  • 455 million WordPress Websites Globally
  • 60 Languages use on WordPress with 71% of the content in English
  • 20 billion pages viewed each month

Why WordPress?

Seeking WordPress website design ideas to get the right rhythm of business progress is essential, but the question is why? Why do you choose WordPress? Before diving deep into a hub of WordPress, you should know the following:

  • WordPress is a free and open-source platform. So, it is easy to install and simple to manage without making any huge investment.
  • It offers customized website designing and makes it more dynamic by integrating plenty of features.
  • Content is king, and content Management gets easy with WordPress.
  • With the availability of numerous themes, business professionals outline their website as per target niche.

WordPress Trends To Watch Out for 2023

If you look after the WordPress trends, you will see huge changes in the content management system. People use WordPress development services because of effective content management. After implementing countless improvements, WordPress serves the best experience to users. The latest trends to go through while handling WordPress are:

Ecommerce:

COVID pandemic and lockdown accelerates the business of the online industry and makes e-commerce an indispensable part of the global retail industry. In 2020, more than 2 billion people used online services to purchase goods. The buzz in the retail industry diverts people’s minds to choosing WordPress for startups.

3D Virtual Reality:

Technologies always inspire people to make significant changes in lifestyle as well as in business. Integrating virtual reality in the business processes helps users to provide an enhanced experience for managing their requirements. 3D virtual reality is one of few technologies incorporated in business through WordPress website ideas. Some efforts reflect Google Maps Street View and virtual trials.

Chatbots:

Solving queries in real-time brings flexibility in project management and enhances user engagement. If consumers get solutions in minimum time, it will make business more approachable. It is possible through chatbots. And WordPress project ideas help you to implement your technical requirements into reality.

Video Backgrounds:

Advance your website from static slider to video background to increase impression on your digital presence. WordPress developers help to make your website more dynamic by running videos in the background.

Drag & Drop website builders:

WordPress web developers present their creativity on the website through integrating drag and drop features into it. Creating the outlook of a website is just a first step. You need to integrate more features into a website to make it more engaging and functional.

Let’s have a quick look at the Free & Paid WordPress Website Theme Ideas For eCommerce Business

While diving into the best WordPress ideas, you need to perform in-depth research. To make your research less hectic, we have some suggestions for you. Choose the most appropriate WordPress theme as per your business requirements to reshape your project’s ideas.

Are you facing problems while choosing the best eCommerce WordPress theme to develop the website? Here is the list to pick the suitable theme as per your project requirements. To make your decision more effective, include some critical keynotes in your business strategies:

  • Is the selected WordPress theme responsive on mobiles? Be clear about which would be your platform (website or mobiles) to target your audience and choose the theme accordingly.
  • Check if your theme is SEO-friendly to embark your digital presence in search engines.
  • Think about your budget and decide whether you want a free or paid version of the WordPress theme.
  • Customization should be part of your WordPress theme so that you can implement necessary updates in your website as per your requirements.
  • The available version of the theme should be compatible with your WordPress version.

1. OceanWP

With the availability of customized options, Ocean WP is one of the most used WordPress websites to build dynamic eCommerce platforms. It makes your website load in minimum time and offers great support to third-party plugins.

WordPress developers can make eCommerce websites more user-engaging with page builders. Ocean WP is compatible with page builders such as Visual Composer, WPBakery, Beaver Builder, and more.

The theme is available with three different mobile menu styles and seven customizable header styles. While working on Ocean WP, you don’t need to have excellent command over coding. Moreover, you can boost your eCommerce sales with the theme as it is SEO-friendly.

Highlights:

  • Fully responsive & mobile-friendly websites
  • eCommerce ready with customized features
  • Personal and business plans are also available
  • Build an advanced online store

2. Neve

When WordPress website design ideas strike your mind, you will definitely opt for Neve. It renders the mobile-first approach to make the website accessible and compatible with AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages).

It is a fast and lightweight WordPress theme. Neve is a multipurpose theme and a product of Themelsle. Compatibility with page builder, Neve offers flexibility to customize titles, footers, as well headers.

Empower your eCommerce business by taking advantage of Neve WordPress theme features. You can provide good strength to your online business with WooCommerce booster, blog booster, custom layouts, and more. So, make a robust connection with a custom WordPress development company to skyrocket your eCommerce business.

Highlights

  • Easy to roll back to the previous version with one click
  • Compatibility with popular caching and minification plugins
  • SEO friendly to make an ever-lasting online impression
  • Use Vanilla JavaScript to offer optimized performance

Also Read: 10 Reasons Why WordPress Is Better Than Other CMS

3. Zara

With more than 60K happy users, Zakar is one of the top-notch WordPress themes for eCommerce business. Through 65+ pre-made templates, you can pay attention to every minute detail of your website and make it more engaging.

It offers enhanced security through fixing bugs regularly and updating websites frequently. Through validating, sanitizing, and escaping user data, Zakra can create a layer of security outside your website.

Zara is a fully responsive theme and makes your website workable on every device. Apart from eCommerce business, you can install the theme to get experience in personal blogging, education, wedding, and more.

Highlights

  • Mobile menu styling and breakpoint
  • Active support to resolve queries
  • Free Multipurpose WordPress theme
  • Complete documentation

4. Divi

Divi is another most powerful WordPress theme to create high-converting landing pages without writing a single code. This theme adds valuable functions to your WordPress website development and leads your business to new heights.

Through 800 demo designs and a front-end page builder, WordPress developers build amazing websites using the Divi theme. It is supported by Divi Builder. With a drag-and-drop page builder and availability of 40+ modules, your website performs different functions that include testimonials, calls to action, sliders, and more.

Divi offers incredibly advanced visual builder technology to innovate the website with spectacular designs with surprising ease and efficiency. With responsive editing and inline text editing, WordPress plugin ideas become a reality.

Highlights:

  • Responsive editing and design
  • 100+ full website packs
  • Effective customization
  • Easy-to-use website builder for beginners & professionals

5. Viral

WooCommerce compatible and Adsense optimized, Viral is the most beautiful and stylish WordPress theme. While searching for the best WordPress project ideas, Viral WordPress must be on your list.

With four predefined demos, you can create the desired website for upgrading your brand identity. It helps to develop trendy websites, mainly for magazines, affiliate marketing, and news websites.

Hire WordPress developers if you are keen to build customized sites. It uncovers the new chapters of web designing through the eye-catching carousel, social media sharing, and up and down-voting buttons for posts.

Highlights

  • Parallax scrolling for enhanced user experience
  • Advanced typography setting
  • Ajax loading
  • One-click install and update

Related Blog: 10 Reasons Why WordPress Is Better Than Other CMS

6. Flatsome

Flatsome is the best-selling WooCommerce and business theme to offer a fantastic user experience. Without the mess of coding, you can develop an effective site with a revolutionary responsive page builder and impressive portfolio features.

It provides some built-in features such as slider cover, sale countdown, video cover, and more. Using the theme, your website will achieve good speed and fast performance. Integrate lots of blog features and sticky sections to your site with a Flatsome WordPress theme.

Connect with a custom WordPress development company if you have any business idea to implement into a website. Share your queries with them and let them redesign your WordPress business ideas.

Highlight

  • Responsive styling for a text element
  • WordPress 5.6 compatibility
  • Revolutionary drag and drop page builder
  • Huge online library of predefined layouts and sections

7. Shopkeeper

Outgrow sales of your eCommerce business with WordPress theme Shopkeeper. It gives you leverage to set up the theme within 3 minutes. Trusted by 28000+ customers, the WordPress theme offers fast and friendly customer assistance.

Installation of Shopkeeper makes content management easy to handle and sophisticated to create. With a drag and drop editor and visual composer plugin, you can easily develop your eCommerce website without being a pro in coding.

Develop an engaging website with Shopkeeper using the platform of the WordPress development services. So, approach the WordPress developer for hire and access the platform of the best service provider.

Highlights:

  • Multiple layouts for portfolio, blog, and contact page
  • Responsive design
  • Effective customer service
  • Easy to check sales reports

8. Corporate

Corporate is an ideal WordPress theme for startups and small business owners. It is a fully responsive and featured theme from MyThemeShop. Contact a WordPress development company to make your website workable for your business growth.

You can make your site’s homepage more creative using social media icons, featured images, custom logos, and more. With the Corporate WordPress theme, you can boost your client relationship.

The corporate theme allows you to take advantage of the Themify Builder and fully control your website. Build the most customized WordPress theme to increase sales and more user engagement.

Highlights:

  • Pricing tables
  • Highly responsive website
  • Animated experience display
  • Attractive blog layouts

9. Astra

Keeping the website design first, the Astra theme is the best option to get WordPress for startups. It is a highly responsive and customized WordPress theme to create the best website for business progress.

Without any experience in coding, Astra makes your website development easier by showing compatibility with page builders like Beaver Builder and Elementor. It comes with 300+ professionally designed demo sites to make your website the mirror of your business vision.

Astra offers amazing features such as drag and drop builder, advanced styling options, and live editing to make the website more workable. It is 100% open source and developed transparently on Github.

Highlights:

  • Seamless WooCommerce Integration
  • Header Footer Builder
  • Largest Library of Pre-Build Websites
  • Easy customization

10. Porto

Porto is a multipurpose and responsive theme. If you are seeking the best WordPress theme for an eCommerce store, Porto could be your choice. To check out the styles and layouts, the theme is available with several ready-made demo versions.

Using the drag and drop page builder, you can easily customize your website. Porto WordPress theme allows you to integrate incredible features into the website, such as video players, sliders, and more.

Another advantage of opting for the Porto WordPress theme is having well-optimized speed and SEO optimization. It is built on the bootstrap framework and offers an intuitive approach to make the website layout more effective. So, hire WordPress developers to design your website accordingly.

Highlights:

  • 35k+ websites built on Porto
  • Full support for WP Bakery
  • Work fine on low-level servers
  • 30+ eCommerce Demos

Examples To Consider Before Switching to WordPress

1. BBC America

2. Sony Music

3. MTV News

4. Sweden’s Official Website

5. Bata

6. The Walt Disney Company

7. Time Inc.

8. Usain Bolt

9. Facebook Newsroom

10. The New York Times Company

Quick Notes on WordPress for Small Business & Startups

Opting for WordPress development services will help you develop a highly responsive website using the best theme. It will help you to increase your business sales with a positive approach. Before moving to WordPress development, let’s have some quick notes.

  • WordPress is built on MySQL and PHP. It offers free excess to everyone and modification for desired website outlook.
  • WordPress Version 5.2 has been downloaded 16,712,361 times.
  • The love of languages diverts your mind for WordPress as it is available in 68+ languages.
  • The most popular content management system (CMS), WordPress, provides automatic updates and easy access to thousands of free themes & plugins.
  • WordPress has great community support and allows developers to resolve any queries effectively.

Related Blog: 7+ Types Of Best Websites You Can Create Using WordPress

Conclusion:

If you are eager to create buzz on the internet, you must include up-to-date website theme strategies in your business process. If your mind is still confused about choosing the right WordPress website design ideas, contact WordPress developers right now. Your effort, ideas, and approach lead your business to new heights where you can enjoy your success.
